snippet: Carolyn Ryan will be the senior editor for politics, and Elisabeth Bumiller will take over the Washington bureau chief role being vacated by Ms. Ryan
abstract: The New York Times names Carolyn Ryan senior editor for politics and Elisabeth Bumiller as Washington bureau chief.
lead_paragraph: Carolyn Ryan will be the senior editor for politics, and Elisabeth Bumiller will take over the Washington bureau chief role being vacated by Ms. Ryan

headline.main: New York Times Names 2 to Senior Positions
headline.print_headline: The New York Times Names 2 Editors to Senior Positions
